amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds from being used to suspend or revise new mining regulations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that none of the funds in the bill may be used to suspend or revise the final regulations published in the Federal Register on November 21, 2000, that amended environmental mining rules (part 3809 of title 43, Code of Federal Regulations).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 194 (Roll no. 182).
